author: Tess Posthumus
description: Reminiscent of a genever Manhattan served on the dry side with notes of carciofo amaro.
name: Dutch Coupe
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Antica Formula or other well aged sweet vermouth
10 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredient with ice and strain into chilled glass
